title: kalinarulaku
sahitya:
kalinarulaku nI mahima delusuna kamala nayana vAsudEva mahAnubhAva


anupallavi

  jalaja sambhava bhavEndrAdi vandita caraNa


caraNam    su-laitamagu nI caraNamu sokaga silayE ahalyayai velayalEda munu 
balini prahlAduni dhruvuni pAncAlini salupa lEdEmayya haladhara sOdara
